import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import swal from "sweetalert"; import $ from "jquery"; import Header from "./common/Header"; import Sidebar from "./common/Sidebar"; export class SingleHome extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { home: [], }; } componentDidMount() { var id = window.location.href.split("/")[ window.location.href.split("/").length - 1 ]; // console.log(id); axios .get(`${axios.defaults.baseURL}/view-home/${id}`) .then((response) => { console.log(response); return response; }) .then((json) => { if (json.data.success) { this.setState({ home: json.data.home, }); } else { console.log(`Cannot fetch data!`); } }) .catch((error) => { console.error(`An Error Occured! ${error}`); }); } render() { return (
Back to Homes Listing {this.state.home.map((home) => ( <>

{home.name} - {home.type} Installment Plan

{home.description}

{/*
*/}
Preferred Name on Document
Number of Units
))}
); } } export default SingleHome;
